grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 浪【ロウ】person who has spent X years after graduating high school attempting to get admitted to (a specific) university

浪人【ロウニン】rōnin, ronin, masterless samurai, high school graduate waiting for another chance to enter university after having failed the yearly entrance examination, person out of work, jobless person, wanderer, drifter
１浪【イチロウ】failing college entrance exams and retaking them a year later
